ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($Profile.Name<>'RO Profile' && $Profile.Name<>'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name <> 'Additional Registrar'), OR( ISCHANGED(Salutation), ISCHANGED(FirstName), ISCHANGED(MiddleName), ISCHANGED(LastName) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You don't have access to change the Name. Please Contact RO Office.
